mapper.sql: a.patient_name AS 'patientName', a.patient_sex AS 'patientSex', a.patient_age AS 'patientAge', a.patient_host_num AS 'patientHostNum', a.inspec_depart AS 'inspecDepart', a.patient_bed_num AS 'patientBedNum', a.specimen_type AS 'specimenType', a.outpat_service AS 'outpatService', a.specimen_status AS 'specimenStatus', a.sample_num AS 'sampleNum', a.inspec_date AS 'inspecDate', a.inspec_doctor AS 'inspecDoctor', a.check_doctor AS 'checkDoctor', a.check_report_date AS 'checkReportDate', a.create_date AS 'createDate', a.create_user_id AS 'createUserId'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_result (patient_name,patient_sex,patient_age,patient_host_num,inspec_depart,patient_bed_num,specimen_type,outpat_service,specimen_status,sample_num,inspec_date,inspec_doctor,check_doctor,check_report_date,create_date,create_user_id) VALUE ( patient_name = #{patientName}, patient_sex = #{patientSex}, patient_age = #{patientAge}, patient_host_num = #{patientHostNum}, inspec_depart = #{inspecDepart}, patient_bed_num = #{patientBedNum}, specimen_type = #{specimenType}, outpat_service = #{outpatService}, specimen_status = #{specimenStatus}, sample_num = #{sampleNum}, inspec_date = #{inspecDate}, inspec_doctor = #{inspecDoctor}, check_doctor = #{checkDoctor}, check_report_date = #{checkReportDate}, create_date = #{createDate}, create_user_id = #{createUserId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE check_result SET
patient_name = #{patientName},
patient_sex = #{patientSex},
patient_age = #{patientAge},
patient_host_num = #{patientHostNum},
inspec_depart = #{inspecDepart},
patient_bed_num = #{patientBedNum},
specimen_type = #{specimenType},
outpat_service = #{outpatService},
specimen_status = #{specimenStatus},
sample_num = #{sampleNum},
inspec_date = #{inspecDate},
inspec_doctor = #{inspecDoctor},
check_doctor = #{checkDoctor},
check_report_date = #{checkReportDate},
create_user_id = #{createUserId}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(a.id) FROM check_result a -- LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON a.create_user_id = u.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.patient_name = #{patientName}
